definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

pinyin: Ai1 ji2 gu3 wu4 xue2 zhe3

sentences.english: Lin Zexu (Lin Tse-hsu ) was a Chinese scholar and official during the Qing dynasty.

sentences.english: Philology prevailed very much in Qing Dynasty and especially many top-ranking scholars ever studied it at that time.

sentences.english: Many chemists pay attention to how to make good use of the non-active microorganism.

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
